code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{GlobalContext}from"../context/GlobalState";export var IncomeExpenses=function IncomeExpenses(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var Inamounts=transactions.filter(function(t){return t.type=="Income";}).map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});console.log(Inamounts);var Examounts=transactions.filter(function(t){return t.type=="Expense";}).map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var income=Inamounts.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=+item;},0).toFixed(2);var expense=Examounts.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=+item;},0).toFixed(2);var total=income-expense;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"inc-exp-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Your Balance"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,"$",total)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Income"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money plus"},income)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Expense"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money minus"},expense)));};
